document.docAuthor: Liu, Zhen, He, Jun-Hua, Chen, Xue-Xin & Gupta, Ankita
document.masterDocTitle: The ater-group of the genus Apanteles Foerster (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae) from China with the descriptions of forty-eight new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The ater-group of the genus Apanteles Foerster (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Microgastrinae) from China with the descriptions of forty-eight new species

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Microgaster sodalis Haliday, 1834: 246
. Holotype ♀ —? [lost].
Reinhard, 1880: 365
; Marshall, 1885: 200; Marshall, 1889: 459; Thomson, 1895: 2266; Ivanov, 1898: 63; Fahringer, 1935: 203.

subSubSection.paragraph: Diagnosis. Body length 2.0 mm, fore wing length 2.7 mm . Body black, hind femur blackish. Ocelli small, posterior tangent to anterior ocellus just touching posterior ocelli, distance between fore and hind ocellus about as long as diameter of hind ocellus. Antenna longer than body length, penultimate flagellomere 1.6× longer than wide. Interspaces between punctures on disc of mesonotum slightly shorter than its diameter. Areola on propodeum V-shaped apically, with poorly defined costulae, posterio-lateral parts unsculptured. Pterostigma 3.0× as long as its widest part, vein 1-R1 1.2× longer than pterostigma, vein r 1.4× longer than vein 2-SR, distinctly angled at junction. T1 slightly constricted towards apex, 2.3× longer than hind width, turned-over part slightly shiny, weakly rugose, longitudinal channel distinct; T2 shiny and polished, 3.8× wider than long in the middle; T3 2.0× longer than T2. Ovipositor sheath 0.9 length of hind tibia.

Hosts. According to the label, Maruba
testulalis Geyer
( Lepidoptera : Pyralidae ). According to literature,
Acleris fimbriana (Thunberg & Becklin)
,
A. orana Fischer von Roslerstamm
,
Aleimma loeflingiana
(L.),
Archips crataegana Hubner
,
Archips oporana
(L.),
Archips oporana
(L.) [
Mespilus germanica
],
A. rosana
(L.),
Archips xylosteana
(L.), Biston betularia (L.),
Choristoneura murinana Hubner
[
Abies alba
],
Choristoneura rosaceana (Harris)
,
Croesia bergmanniana
(L.),
G. funebrana (Treitschke)
,
Cydia janthinana (Duponchel)
,
Cydia pomonella
(L.),
Dahlica inconspicuella (Stainton)
,
Dichelia histrionana (Frolich)
,
Hedya nubiferana (Haworth)
,
Leucoma salicis
(L.),
Loxostege sticticalis
(L.),
Lozotaenia forsterana (Fabricius)
,
Notocelia uddmanniana
(L.),
Olethreutes hercyniana Treitschke
,
Operophtera brumata
(L.),
Pandemis cerasana (Hubner 1786)
,
Pandemis corylana Fabricius
, Pandemis heparana Denis & Schiffermuller,
Plutella xylostella
(L.),
Ptycholoma lecheana
(L.),
Spilonota ocellana (Denis & Schiffermuller)
,
Yponomeuta malinella Zeller
(
Yu et al . 2016
).
